Adult.description: Great Egrets are much larger than Cattle Egrets with a much longer and thinner neck. In flight, Great Egrets have much slower and deeper wingbeats than Cattle Egrets.

Snowy Egrets are taller and more slender than Cattle Egrets. They have a black bill, whereas adult Cattle Egrets have a yellow bill. Snowy Egrets are usually found in wetter habitats than Cattle Egrets.

Juvenile.description: Juvenile Little Blue Herons are mostly white, but they are more slender than Cattle Egrets, with greener legs and more grayish at the base of the bill.
